profile_agent.description: Builds a single HCP 360 summary for personalization.
profile_agent.responsibilities: Return demographics, specialties, practice setting, preferred communication channels, decision-making role, and personalization hooks for field engagement.
examples_of_use: Prepare personalized intro for an upcoming call with Dr. Smith
Find HCP specialty and preferred contact method to tailor outreach

get_profile.description: Return HCP demographics, specialty, affiliations and personalization signals.

history_agent.description: Retrieves recent interactions, objections, and notes from prior visits.
history_agent.responsibilities: Return past meeting dates, outcomes, open objections, who attended, follow-up requests and action items.
examples_of_use: Summarize the last two calls with Dr. Smith and outstanding objections
Show payer or access objections raised previously

get_history.description: Returns last interactions, notes, and unresolved objections.

prescribing_agent.description: Analyzes prescribing trends and therapy switches at HCP and peer level.
prescribing_agent.responsibilities: Provide recent Rx volumes, share shifts vs competitors, common switches, growth opportunities and potential eligible patient counts.
examples_of_use: Is Dr. X increasing prescriptions of Product A versus Competitor B?
Identify patients eligible for a therapy switch

get_prescribing.description: Return prescribing habits, volume trends, and therapy switch signals.

access_agent.description: Provides formulary, payer & access updates and patient support program information.
access_agent.responsibilities: Return current formulary tiering, recent payer decisions, prior authorization requirements and reimbursement FAQs relevant to the HCP's patient population.
examples_of_use: Check if Product A has favorable tiering for Dr. Smith's patients
List prior authorization criteria for Product A for Medicare patients

get_access.description: Return formulary wins/losses and recent access changes for the HCP.

competitive_agent.description: Surfaces competitor activity, messaging pushes, and clinical events.
competitive_agent.responsibilities: Return competitor product launches, promotional themes, recent trial data, speakers, and local sales activity that may impact the HCP.
examples_of_use: Has Competitor X released new efficacy data relevant to Dr. Smith?
Is there heightened competitor detailing in Dr. Smith's territory?

get_competitive.description: Return competitor activity summary and signals of share shifts.

content_agent.description: Selects approved content and sales assets matched to objective and HCP context.
content_agent.responsibilities: Recommend the top-call materials (one-pager, dosing card, clinical summary), digital links, and leave-behind content aligned to HCP's interests and objections.
examples_of_use: Recommend materials for a first in-office visit with a new cardiologist
Find payer-focused one-pager for field to share with office manager

get_content.description: Return recommended content pieces and asset links.
